EmailTemplate.name: Delegation Finished
EmailTemplate.Body: $delegateeName has finished the delegated item '$workItemName'. Please review the items.
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying the original owner that the delegated item has been completed.

Argument.name: workItemName
Argument.Description: The description property of the delegation WorkItem.

Argument.name: certification
Argument.Description: The Certification object containing the delegated item.

Argument.name: delegateeName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that finished the delegation.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Delegation Completed by $delegateeName
